name: Cardboard Ops: Tactical Box Action
description:
Metal Gear Solid parody: 4-player couch multiplayer game made for Pigsquad Summer Slow Jams.  PS4 controllers required for multiplayer

Controls:

Rocket- X to fire

Nikita- X to fire, d pad to steer

C4- square to place, hold square to detonate

Created by:

Andrew Hair

David McCoy

Derrick Niehaus

Jacob Penner

Sandra Zhovner

Special thanks and love to Hideo Kojima and none for Konami
